description:
Even Onyankopon-sama gets nervous sometimes.
But apparently writing something onto your hand and swallowing that is supposed to help.
What`s exactly is one supposed to write?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kinchou Shichatte Dou Shiyou Da Nya
What to Do About Getting Nervous, Meow
緊張しちゃってどうしようだニャ
